context: Evaluates correct usage of the agent-skills Jira skill to add a public comment to an issue. The solution must call add_comment or the equivalent CLI issue comment subcommand and correctly submit the comment body to the Jira API.

checklist.name: Comment call made
checklist.description: The solution calls add_comment with the issue key and comment body, or invokes jira.py with 'issue comment <key> --body <text>' to submit the comment

checklist.name: No security level set
checklist.description: For a public comment, the security_level parameter of add_comment is omitted or set to None, resulting in no visibility restriction on the posted comment

checklist.name: Success confirmation
checklist.description: The solution outputs a confirmation message including the created comment's ID or a success status after add_comment completes

checklist.name: Error handling
checklist.description: When add_comment raises an APIError due to an invalid issue key, the error is caught and a descriptive message is shown
